suggestions.name: Protein-Packed Oatmeal with Scrambled Eggs
suggestions.description: A hearty breakfast combining creamy oatmeal with fluffy scrambled eggs for maximum protein.
instructions: Combine oats and milk in a pot and bring to a simmer
Cook for 3-5 minutes until oats are tender, stirring occasionally
Meanwhile, whisk eggs with a pinch of salt in a bowl
Heat oil in a non-stick pan over medium heat
Pour in eggs and scramble until just set, about 2 minutes
Serve oatmeal in a bowl topped with scrambled eggs and a sprinkle of cinnamon

suggestions.name: Savory Oat Bowl with Fried Eggs
suggestions.description: A savory twist on traditional oatmeal topped with perfectly fried eggs for extra protein.
instructions: Cook oats with 1 cup water and a pinch of salt for 5 minutes until creamy
Stir in spinach and cheese until wilted and melted
Heat oil in a non-stick pan over medium heat
Crack eggs into the pan and cook until whites are set but yolks are runny
Season eggs with salt and pepper
Serve oats in a bowl topped with the fried eggs

suggestions.name: Egg and Oat Breakfast Muffins
suggestions.description: Portable, protein-rich breakfast muffins combining eggs and oats in a convenient grab-and-go format.
instructions: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C) and grease a muffin tin
Whisk eggs in a bowl with milk, salt and pepper
Stir in oats and let sit for 5 minutes to soften
Divide mixture evenly into 6 muffin cups
Bake for 15-18 minutes until set and lightly golden
Let cool for 5 minutes before removing from tin
